creator: FIE
descriptionHtml:
FIE Swordplay is the first mobile game with real athletic rules for fencing with foils, swords, and sabers that is officially supported by the FIE (http://fie.org). Learn real techniques — from simple thrusts to powerful lunges and devious feints. Play against an AI opponent or challenge a social network friend to a duel.

Choose the country you want to represent, equip your fencer, and enter tournaments all over the world. Fight your way from ambitious novice to fencing master.

Features of FIE Swordplay

• The world's first mobile game with real rules and techniques from athletic fencing
• Gorgeous 3D graphics, phenomenal animation, and real fencing physics
• Deep customization — fine-tune your weapons and equip your character with gear such as vests and masks
• Compelling PvE campaign: fight your way from novice athlete to Olympic champion
• Asynchronous PvP mode: duel your social network friends
• Incredibly simple, easy-to-use controls. Master several types of weapons quickly, then hone your skills
• Officially supported by the International Fencing Federation

Start playing FIE Swordplay and compete in fencing duels that are dynamic, striking, and full of drama — right on the screen of your mobile device! Athletic combat with swords and foils has never looked so spectacular!
descriptionShort: Swordplay is the first mobile game with real athletic rules for fencing.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Maison du Sport International
Avenue de Rhodanie 54
1007 Lausanne - Suisse
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In this version, the UI has been updated on the campaign, club, and profile screens. A number of graphical bugs on tablets have been fixed. New skins have been added: Knight and Musketeer. In addition, a lot of work has been done to optimize the game.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Maison du Sport International
Avenue de Rhodanie 54
1007 Lausanne - Suisse
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Dear fencers!
Check out the new update!
- Teams: team up and lead them to victory!
- Team chat: communicate and share experience in team chat with your teammates!
- The game mail system: don't forget to check your inbox!
- Team ranking: take part in the team league and get to the top of the leaderboard!
- The newest system for finding teammates
- Many small improvements

Avenue de Rhodanie 54
1007 Lausanne - Suisse
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Dear Fencers!
Here are some exciting locations, events and competitions!
- New characters in your team
- The Office - a unique private equipment collection
- Five weekly events with excellent rewards
- A tour around the cities of the world! Choose your way to your rewards
- A new equipment store
- Various small changes

appDetails.developerAddress:
Maison du Sport International
Avenue de Rhodanie 54
1007 Lausanne - Suisse
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Dear Fencers!
Say hello to our new update!
- Painter - a new consumable item which can be used to change the color of your equipment!
- Palettes: It is now possible to change the look of separate items and whole sets to stand out when you compete!
- New Equipment section
- New Warrior and Assassin skins
- Lots of technical improvements

appDetails.developerAddress:
Maison du Sport International
Avenue de Rhodanie 54
1007 Lausanne - Suisse
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New Duels Mode
- New Leagues
- Introduction of Player Levels
- Interface changes
- New character control buttons during bouts

title: FIE Swordplay

container.value:
Maison du Sport International
Avenue de Rhodanie 54
1007 Lausanne - Suisse

creator: FIE
descriptionHtml:
FIE Swordplay is the first mobile game with real athletic rules for fencing with foils, swords, and sabers that is officially supported by the FIE (http://fie.org). Learn real techniques — from simple thrusts to powerful lunges and devious feints. Play against an AI opponent or challenge a social network friend to a duel.

Choose the country you want to represent, equip your fencer, and enter tournaments all over the world. Fight your way from ambitious novice to fencing master.

Features of FIE Swordplay

• The world's first mobile game with real rules and techniques from athletic fencing
• Gorgeous 3D graphics, phenomenal animation, and real fencing physics
• Deep customization — fine-tune your weapons and equip your character with gear such as vests and masks
• Compelling PvE campaign: fight your way from novice athlete to Olympic champion
• Asynchronous PvP mode: duel your social network friends
• Incredibly simple, easy-to-use controls. Master several types of weapons quickly, then hone your skills
• Officially supported by the International Fencing Federation

Start playing FIE Swordplay and compete in fencing duels that are dynamic, striking, and full of drama — right on the screen of your mobile device! Athletic combat with swords and foils has never looked so spectacular!
descriptionShort: Swordplay is the first mobile game with real athletic rules for fencing.

Avenue de Rhodanie 54
1007 Lausanne - Suisse

creator: FIE
descriptionHtml:
FIE Swordplay is the first mobile game with real athletic rules for fencing with foils, swords, and sabers that is officially supported by the FIE (http://fie.org). Learn real techniques — from simple thrusts to powerful lunges and devious feints. Play against an AI opponent or challenge a social network friend to a duel.

Choose the country you want to represent, equip your fencer, and enter tournaments all over the world. Fight your way from ambitious novice to fencing master.

Features of FIE Swordplay

• The world's first mobile game with real rules and techniques from athletic fencing
• Gorgeous 3D graphics, phenomenal animation, and real fencing physics
• Deep customization — fine-tune your weapons and equip your character with gear such as vests and masks
• Compelling PvE campaign: fight your way from novice athlete to Olympic champion
• Asynchronous PvP mode: duel your social network friends
• Incredibly simple, easy-to-use controls. Master several types of weapons quickly, then hone your skills
• Officially supported by the International Fencing Federation

Start playing FIE Swordplay and compete in fencing duels that are dynamic, striking, and full of drama — right on the screen of your mobile device! Athletic combat with swords and foils has never looked so spectacular!
descriptionShort: Swordplay is the first mobile game with real athletic rules for fencing.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Maison du Sport International
Avenue de Rhodanie 54
1007 Lausanne - Suisse
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New League system
- New combo techniques
- Adjusted Duel matchmaking
- Lots of small quality of life updates and changes
